leftSection_5.title: Secure Your UAE Trademark with Our Proven 4-Step Solution

items.title: Book Your Consultation
items.description: We’ll kick off your trademark registration journey in Dubai by discussing your unique trademark registration needs.

items.title: Undergo an Eligibility Check
items.description: Next, our expert consultants conduct an exhaustive search of existing trademarks to ensure your creative mark is eligible.

items.title: Get the Necessary Approvals
items.description: Once cleared, we’ll submit your application, publish your trademark in official newspapers, and monitor it for 30 days to resolve any conflicts.

items.title: Issue Your Certificate
items.description: Lastly, our experts will help you receive a registration certificate valid for over 10 years and renewable indefinitely.

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: How long does UAE trademark registration take?
items.answer: It typically takes 3-6 weeks, depending on the location, application accuracy, and document readiness.

items.question: How long does the trademark remain valid?
items.answer: The trademark remains valid for approximately 10 years and can be renewed indefinitely with proper filings.

items.question: What happens if someone objects to my trademark?
items.answer: Yes! Since the UAE is a member of the Berne Convention, you get work protection across 170 countries.

items.question: What documents do I need to apply for trademark registration?
items.answer: You’ll need copies of your passport or trade license and power of attorney.

items.question: Will my UAE trademark protect me internationally?
items.answer: Not automatically, but it’s a strong foundation. We can help extend protection to GCC countries without reapplying in each jurisdiction.
